post.text: UNBELIEVABLE MICHIGAN! I want to thank you for your support tonight -- the energy was absolutely incredible. If you all get out to vote on 11/8/2016 --- there is no question we will WIN MICHIGAN! I love this country - and I love you all. Thank you!

comment.author: Dalton
comment.text: In the 11th hour....HE'S BLOWING IT! Been supporting him....NO MORE! If TRUMP can't forget about a 20 year old beauty pageant... ? NOBODY took away his phone yet! # AM tweet! WTF he doing? Guess I'll vote Stein!

replies.author: Karlyn
replies.text: She has a warrant for her arrest...so you might as vote for Hillary
